Pre-Game Insights: The Brewers have dominated the season series against the Cardinals, winning 7 out of 10 matchups so far.
In their last outing, the Cardinals showcased a powerful offense, defeating the New York Yankees 14-7.
The pitching matchup features Andre Pallante for St. Louis against Freddy Peralta for Milwaukee.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Brewers have been solid at home (40-25) and possess one of the league's best records in games where they hit multiple home runs (30-8).
The Cardinals have struggled on the road, sitting with a 33-36 record, but their offense ranks fifth in the National League with 668 runs scored this season.
Others: Sal Frelick has been a consistent performer for the Brewers this season, with a batting average of around.283, 21 home runs, and 72 RBIs.
The Cardinals' bullpen has struggled recently, which could provide additional scoring opportunities for Frelick and the Brewers.
